# Interface LlmMatcherConfig

Configuration for LLM-based intent matching

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "LlmMatcherConfig".

interface LlmMatcherConfig {  
embedding_similarity_threshold?: string | number;  
max_embedding_matches_for_llm?: string | number;  
prompt_template: string;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

embedding_similarity_threshold? max_embedding_matches_for_llm? prompt_template

## Properties

### `Optional`embedding_similarity_threshold

embedding_similarity_threshold?: string | number

Minimum similarity threshold for phrases to include in LLM prompt

### `Optional`max_embedding_matches_for_llm

max_embedding_matches_for_llm?: string | number

Maximum number of embedding matches to include in LLM prompt

### prompt_template

prompt_template: string

Template for generating prompts
